verbs.description: [V: snap] [ARG0: ceo] tells employees to aim for profits in 2019 apologizes for rushed redesign snap ceo evan spiegel outlined the company goals for profitability in 2019 and apologizes for its redesign in a 15-page memo sent to employees dated sept 26 cheddar reported ceo cnbc cheddar evan spiegel
